subject: Mixed Martial Arts
lead_paragraph: The U.F.C. star Jon Jones was charged with drunken driving after the Bentley he was driving struck a utility pole in Binghamton, N.Y., the police said.
snippet: The U.F.C. star Jon Jones was charged with drunken driving after the Bentley he was driving struck a utility pole in Binghamton, N.Y., the police said.
